attributes.action: Lift the petition on the smoking ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smokers were not asked if they wanted a smoking ban only 30% of the population were asked leaving the rest of the country to agree to it through bullying tatics. Its about time the smokers were given the choice.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
